attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is grossly unfair that pensioners have to submit to means testing, it is like asking for charity, as a country we should be ashamed at the way we treat pensioners, why not bring us in line with other european countries
So what if wealthy pensioners benefit, they will eventually have to pay it back in income tax

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
